name: Life Tree
description:
There is a big tree of life in the middle and there are enemies trying to reach this tree. That's your task. You are the last hope here. You must kill the enemies, protect the tree.

While doing this, you can damage enemies with one of your weapons and steal their lives, and you can gain XP with your other weapon.

Key 1 - HP gun

Key 2 - XP gun

Kaan Eren Şanlı - Game Developer

Akın Aydın- Game Developer

Buse Durmuş - Pixel Artist

Efe Karahan - Pixel Artist

Berke Altun - SFX
